attributes.action: Close the borders in to the uk and deport all from the war zone  middle east
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is the paris massacre also the guns seized in Kent recently skorpian automatic machine guns there are mini illegal refugees smuggled into England every day it is easier for heat detectors and sniffer dogs to find a human body on a truck but yet they still able to come in you can hide 5 automatic weapons in the space of one body mass that the heat detectors and the dogs will not find so you can imagine the amount of weapons that are coming in waiting to be used by the Isis in the uk
attributes.background: There are 1000s of people flooding in to the uk from the war zone middle east and europe they are smuggling guns into the United Kingdom and Europe enough guns to start a civil war this needs to be stopped now our goverment can not let this time bomb thats waiting to explode happen in the uk
